title: American aerospace pioneer and parachute jumper Joseph Kittinger dies at 94
description: Air Force Colonel Joseph Kittinger held a world record for a parachute jump from the edge of space for over 50 years, and paved the way for future space exploration.

title: Stumbling with their words, some people let AI do the talking
description: A machine that talks like a person has long been a science fiction fantasy. Now it’s closer to reality than ever before.

title: Humans vs. robots: The battle reaches a ‘turning point’
description: Warehouse robots at companies like Amazon and FedEx are finally able to pick and sort things with humanlike finesse.
